mapper.insert: insert into pf_sku_stock (id, create_time, supplier_id, spu_id, sku_id, stock, frozen_stock, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozenStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pf_sku_stock set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_stock = #{frozenStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, supplier_id, spu_id, sku_id, stock, frozen_stock, remark from pf_sku_stock
